review: I can't go beyond the ease of set-up as I haven't had sufficient time to utilize the promised potential of the gizmo however, it was a no-brainer to hook-up, with but one exception:  the lengths of the cable for the USB connection and the power cord were a bit short and made it difficult to hide the wires coming off of my wall-mounted TV.

review: I love being able to connect to the Amazon Prime streaming via the Fire TV Stick! Accessing NetFlix via the Fire TV Stick is SUPER Slow and constantly buffering, unlike when i access it via Apple TV. In short, Fire TV Stick should only be used for Prime streaming.

review: I purchased this for one main reason.  I was tired of streaming my Amazon Prime movies and Netflix to my iPad.  I wanted to be able to watch these videos on my TV.  It was easy to set up and I am enjoying it thoroughly.  I like the other features but I am still exploring all of them.  The price is fabulous and compared to others, it is so very reasonable.  You will not be disappointed!
